text: Tomara yakhana yud'dhalabdha sampadera uddesye yatra kara ta hastagata karara jan'ye takhana pechane-pare-thaka lokera sange sange balabe -- ''amadera anumati da'o yate amara tomadera anugamana karate pari.’’ Tara allah‌ra kalama badalate caya. Tumi balo -- ''tomara kichute'i amadera anugamana karabe na, allah itipurbe'o emanata'i balechilena.’’ Tate tara sange sange balabe -- ''baram tomara amadera irsa karacha.’’ Bastuta tara yatsaman'ya chara bojhe na.
